content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's great to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment to be a perfect fit for your needs. How much were you considering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I am a student and I am looking for a bargain, so I was thinking about 300 euros per month. It's a fair price for a student like me.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand that you're a student and might be on a budget, Max. However, I have to be honest with you. The location of this apartment is very central, and the facilities are top-notch. 300 euros per month is quite low for an apartment of this quality in Magdeburg. Would you be open to discussing a higher price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Sure, I am always open to discussions. However, as I said before, I am a student and I am on a tight budget. So, I am willing to pay 350 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. 350 euros per month is still below the market value for this apartment, but I can see that you're serious about finding a place that fits your budget. How about we meet in the middle? I'll offer you the apartment for 400 euros per month, and I think that's a very fair price considering the location and the amenities. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, 400 euros per month is a bit high for me. However, I am willing to pay 380 euros per month. I hope you will accept this offer.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, your offer is certainly closer to my asking price. However, I must insist on 400 euros per month. I believe this is a very reasonable price for the quality of the apartment and its central location. If you're willing to pay 380 euros per month, I'm sorry, but I cannot accept that offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. However, I am willing to pay 390 euros per month. I hope this is a fair price for both parties.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, your persistence is commendable. 390 euros per month is indeed closer to my expectations. However, I must stress that 400 euros per month is the lowest I can go. I believe this is a fair price for both parties, considering the market value and the amenities provided. If you're unable to meet this price, I understand. We can terminate the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I reached my limit with the price of 390 euros per month and cannot exceed that amount.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand, Max. It seems we have reached an impasse. Since you are unable to meet the price of 400 euros per month, I will have to look for another tenant who can appreciate the value of this apartment. Thank you for your time, and I wish you the best of luck in your search for a suitable place to live. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
